His cal___ in parti_____ are ac__ due t_ the ra__ being uph___. There are also some sores on his chest as a result of his shirt chafing against his skin.
data.fullContent: George ran a marathon for charity, and destroyed his body. He pushed himself too hard, and now his legs are weak and feel like jelly. His calves in particular are acid due to the race being uphill. There are also some sores on his chest as a result of his shirt chafing against his skin.
data.answer: 乔治为了慈善事业跑马拉松，结果毁了自己的身体。他把自己推得太紧了，现在他的腿软了，感觉像果冻。他的老茧/组织特别酸，因为比赛是上坡的。由于他的衬衫摩擦他的皮肤，他的胸部也有一些溃疡。
